fields.description: Unique item ID assigned by the model provider or Otto depending on Role.
fields.label: UID

fields.description: JSON list of next UID strings.
fields.label: Next

fields.description: Which of the Next items have been selected.
fields.label: Selected

fields.description: Number of tokens fed into the model for this response.
fields.label: Input Tokens

fields.description: Time stamp before requesting provider API.
fields.label: Start Time

fields.description: End reason given by provider for terminating generation.
fields.label: End Reason

fields.description: Cost of generating this response. Might not be accurate.
fields.label: Cost

fields.description: Number of tokens in the model response.
fields.label: Output Tokens

fields.description: Time stamp after provider response is completely generated.
fields.label: End Time

fields.description: Time stamp of when the SessionItem was created.
fields.label: Timestamp

fields.description: JSON dump of the SessionItem content list.
fields.label: Content

fields.description: Whether this Item has been selected as a next Item. This may be unchecked if execution resumes from an earlier point with a different item.
fields.label: Is Selected

fields.description: Average time taken between two streamed chunks in the response
fields.label: Inter Chunk Latency

fields.description: Time taken to receive the first chunk
fields.label: Time To First Chunk
